data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Thor is heir to the throne of Asgard, world of the gods. With ____ vigorous ____, ____ is ____ to Earth in ____ form ____ a ____, ____ disobeying ____ father Odin and ____ into Jotunheim, ____ to ____ enemy Frost Giants. Thor ____ in New Mexico ____ meets ____ develops ____ with ____ Jane Foster. Meanwhile in Asgard, Thor's brother Loki plans to ascend to the throne and sends the Destroyer to kill Thor.
data.partBlankContent: Thor is heir to the throne of Asgard, world of the gods. Thor la___ in New Mexico a__ meets a__ develops rom____ with astroph_______ Jane Foster. Meanwhile in Asgard, Thor's brother Loki plans to ascend to the throne and sends the Destroyer to kill Thor.
data.answer: 托尔是阿斯加德的王位继承人，阿斯加德是众神的世界。由于性格刚强，他以凡人的形式被驱逐到地球，因为他不服从父亲奥丁的命令，闯入了敌人冰霜巨人的家园约顿海姆。雷神抵达新墨西哥州，与天体物理学家简·福斯特相遇并发展恋情。与此同时，在阿斯加德，托尔的弟弟洛基计划登上王位，并派毁灭者杀死托尔。
